description: Use of dwelling as home office for taxi booking operations for taxi company

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP
VALUER Type: VALUERSDescription: Housing HRA
VALUER Type: VALUERSDescription: Housing Estates

decision_conditions: The Royal Borough of Kingston upon Thames as the Local Planning Authority hereby certify that on 26.08.2023, the use of part of  the existing dwellinghouse for the taking of bookings online and  by telephone  by the applicant for a private hire taxi business is lawful within the meaning of section 192 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 for the following reason:The private hire taxi business within the property amounts to the receipt of bookings online and by telephone  with no picking up or dropping off of customers at the site or comings and goings of drivers to the premises. No external alterations are proposed, and the nature and scale of the business use would not amount to a material change of use of part or whole of the house. As such, planning permission is not required.
